# Basic valid commits with whitelisted verbs
Add new feature
Fix authentication bug
Update dependencies
Remove deprecated code
Improve performance metrics
Migrate to new API
Move files to new location
Release version 2.0.0
Replace old implementation
Revert previous commit
Disable feature flag
Enable new functionality

# With issue references - flexible format (anything in square brackets)
[PROJ-123] Add new feature
[NOTION-456] Fix authentication bug
[BUG-1] Fix critical error
[TASK-9999] Update documentation
[STORY-42] Add user management feature
[EPIC-100] Migrate to new architecture
[UI-7] Improve user interface
[API-2000] Update endpoints

# With flexible reference formats
[notion-456] Update documentation
[bug-1] Fix critical error
[feature/auth] Add authentication system
[#123] Fix reported issue
[WIP] Add new component
[hotfix/security] Fix vulnerability
[2024-Q1] Update quarterly report
[v2.0.0] Release new version

# Special ignored patterns - WIP
wip
WIP
wip: working on feature
WIP: implementing feature

# Git interactive rebase commands
fixup! Add new feature
squash! Fix bug
drop Add old feature
pick Add something
reword Fix typo
fixup! Update dependencies
squash! Remove deprecated method

# Dependabot commits
Bump @babel/traverse from 7.22.10 to 7.23.2

Bump @types/react from 18.0.0 to 18.0.1
Bump prettier from 2.8.8 to 3.0.0
Bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 3 updates

# Merge commits
Merge pull request #123 from feature-branch
Merge branch 'master' into development
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/main'

# Multi-line commit with body (separated by blank line)
Add foobar

This commit also adds foobar.
